attributes.action: Investigate with the Police MP's from all parties for criminal offences surrounding their expenses claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The system by which MP's expenses have been claimed has been taken criminal advantage of. Theft and Obtaining a Pecuniary Advantage have been identified. Captital Gains tax avoidance is one example and the public have unwittingly been abettors. These are crimes that should be prosecuted. No one should be above the law.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
